name: Thornscatter
description:
Overview

You are a rosehip on a journey to sow your seeds.

Equipped with a thorn, you must slash your way through a jagged world of your own creation.

Collect water droplets scattered across a desolate world so your seeds may one day sprout.

Though be wary, your thorn may be your end.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Left Click or Z to Attack

R to Restart (when dead)

Tab to Toggle Minimap

Escape to Toggle Pause Menu
